duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as the liaison between the company and clients based on assigned projects.
Validate client satisfaction with all provided software and services and address any issues.
Follow the company Implementation Methodology (CIM) for all customer implementations.
Establish a plan for project implementation management and intervene where timeline milestones are being delayed or missed.
Guide and teach clients on the configuration of software to meet business requirements.
Develop and conduct standard & client-tailored training sessions for end-users and train-the-trainer programs.

education_certification.credential: University degree in Occupational Health & Safety, Industrial Hygiene, Business Administration, or Computer Science, or equivalent work experience.
